translations: 骚动，喧嚣；（打爱尔兰式曲棍球所用的）曲棍（等于hurley）；手推车

sentences.sentence: No one expects him to get involved in the hurly-burly of campaigning.
sentences.translation: 谁也没有料到他会身陷乱哄哄的竞选活动。

sentences.sentence: To be perfectly at peace amid the hurly-burly of daily life is a secret worth knowing.
sentences.translation: 怎样能在日常忙乱的生活中得到完全的安息是一个值得知道的秘诀。

sentences.sentence: Few people feel confident enough to throw themselves into the hurly-burly of financial markets on their own.
sentences.translation: 很少有人有足够的信心孤身一人置身于喧嚣的金融市场上。
